name: vue-esm-loader
description: Vue single-file component loader for Node

scripts.test: npm run test:2.6 && npm run test:2.7
scripts.pretest:2.6: npm install --save-dev @vue/test-utils@1.1.1 jsdom@16 jsdom-global@3 vue@2.6 vue-template-compiler@2.6 @vue/component-compiler-utils
scripts.posttest:2.6: npm uninstall @vue/test-utils jsdom jsdom-global vue vue-template-compiler @vue/component-compiler-utils

author: Sebastiaan Marynissen <sebastiaan.marynissen@gmail.com>
